{"renderer":"layout","direction":"vertical","body":[{"renderer":"Particle","lazy":true,"r":15,"height":509,"classname":"i-home__particle"},{"renderer":"wrapper","classname":"i-home__ball"},{"renderer":"wrapper","classname":"i-home__ball"},{"renderer":"wrapper","classname":"i-home__ball"},{"renderer":"grid","span":12,"gutter":30,"classname":"i-home__banner__container","body":[{"renderer":"wrapper","classname":"i-home__banner__wrapper","body":[{"renderer":"html","classname":"i-home__banner__title","html":"百搭云"},{"renderer":"html","classname":"i-home__banner__desc","html":"百搭云是基于Vue框架和ElementPlus组件库研发的用于快速搭建企业级信息管理系统的低代码平台，用来帮助开发者聚焦业务，提高开发效率，节省研发成本。"},{"renderer":"action","round":true,"text":"即刻体验","actionType":"url","classname":"i-breathe-border","url":"/playground"},{"renderer":"action","type":"success","plain":true,"round":true,"text":"登录","actionType":"url","url":"localhost/login","params":{"blank":true}}]},{"renderer":"carousel","height":400,"classname":"i-home__carousel","autoplay":true,"loop":true,"body":[{"renderer":"wrapper","classname":"i-home__carousel__item","body":[{"renderer":"image","src":"http://www.i-renderer.love/images/f51d8338a344b5e356aa382db8c75e6b.png","previews":["https://songshuzhong.github.io/i-assets/public/img/action.png","https://songshuzhong.github.io/i-assets/public/img/initApi.png","https://songshuzhong.github.io/i-assets/public/img/columns.png"]},{"renderer":"html","html":"自带编辑器与文档，了解css、javascript即可上手"},{"renderer":"action","text":"了解详情","actionType":"url","url":"https://songshuzhong.github.io/i-website/dist/index.html#/demo/inputValid"}]},{"renderer":"wrapper","classname":"i-home__carousel__item","body":[{"renderer":"image","src":"http://www.i-renderer.love/images/c5a361eb0b4da37778426f713e33fa9c.png","previews":["https://songshuzhong.github.io/i-assets/public/img/action.png"]},{"renderer":"html","html":"丰富的组件库支持，更加自由的搭配组合网页"},{"renderer":"action","text":"了解详情","actionType":"url","url":"https://songshuzhong.github.io/i-website/dist/in
